definition.text: I'm sure you noted there are no more limit buy orders after the order got filled. Instead, sell orders start popping up!

paragraphs.text: Notice how the first Limit Sell Order is placed at 00:22 AM, the minute after the buy order filled!
It's the same minute Superalgos would have gotten notice from the exchange that the order got filled. The Trading Bot connects with the exchange and goes through two distinct cycles.
In the first Cycle, it finds out the status of existing orders. In the second, it gives new instructions.
